Questions and answers about the fantasy game CricketPro We wish you an exciting game and victories in tournaments! What is CricketPro? CricketPro is an exciting world of fantasy cricket where you become the manager of your own team. You can create squads from real cricket players and compete with millions of other fans around the world. How does the CricketPro game work? In CricketPro, you select players for your team based on their real statistics. For every action of your players on the field (points scored, goals taken, etc.) you receive points in a fantasy game. The better your team performs, the more points you earn. The goal is to score the maximum number of points and beat your opponents. How to create a team in CricketPro? To create a team, you need to log into your account on the CricketPro website or mobile application. You can then assemble a team from available players while respecting budget constraints. It is important to carefully consider the composition so that it brings the maximum number of points. How are points awarded in CricketPro? In CricketPro, points are awarded for various actions of players on the field: runs scored, wickets taken, balls caught, economy, etc. The better your players perform, the more points you get. You can track your stats and scores in real time. How can I win prizes at CricketPro? CricketPro regularly hosts competitions and tournaments with impressive prize pools. To win, you need to score the most points by creating an unbeatable fantasy team. Prizes range from cash rewards to CricketPro branded merchandise. Can I play CricketPro for free? Yes, CricketPro offers free membership options. You can create teams and compete with other players without investing your own funds. There are also paid tournaments with large prize pools for those who are willing to bet on their skills. How can I contact CricketPro support? If you have any questions or problems, you can contact CricketPro support. For this, various communication channels are available, such as email, a feedback form on the website or chat in a mobile application. Our team will try to respond to your requests promptly. What type of players is best for a team? Depending on the format of the game, you can balance your team by choosing different types of players - impact batsmen, aggressive bowlers, reliable fielders, all-rounders, etc. It is important to select players based on their recent performances, statistics and upcoming situation. ðŸ“Œ Read More ðŸ“Œ Show Less Download CricketPro and join millions of enthusiasts of this great game from all over the world Do you absolutely love cricket but want to experience it from a completely new perspective? ✭✭✭✭✭ Darshit "CricketPro is hands down the best fantasy cricket game app out there! pages.privacy_policy_site: Privacy Policy for Fantasy Cricket App CricketPro. At CricketPro, we take the privacy of our users seriously. CricketPro Home / Terms / Disclaimer / Privacy Policy Privacy Policy CricketPro At CricketPro, we take the privacy of our users seriously. This Privacy Policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and the steps we take to protect your personal information. Data collection When using CricketPro we may collect the following information: - Personal information such as name, email address and player ID provided when creating an account. - Demographic information such as age, gender and region based on the information you provide. - Usage data including game history, game statistics, in-app purchases, and device information. - Location data may be collected solely with your consent to improve your gaming experience and related services. Data usage We use the collected information for the following purposes: - Providing and improving CricketPro services. - Personalize and optimize your gaming experience. - Marketing, advertising and promotion of relevant content and offers. - Analytics and reporting to understand trends. - Ensuring safety and fulfilling legal obligations. Data Disclosure We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties for direct marketing purposes. However, we may disclose certain information to trusted partners who help us provide CricketPro services: - Cloud service providers for data storage and processing. - Payment processors for secure transaction processing.Marketing and advertising partners to target relevant content. Analytics companies to track and optimize performance. We may also disclose certain information when required by law, to ensure safety, or to protect the interests of CricketPro. Data Security We take reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure or modification. However, no method of transmitting or storing data is completely secure. User rights Depending on applicable law, you may have the right to access, correct or delete your personal data, as well as the right to withdraw consent to data processing. Changes to the Privacy Policy We may update this Policy from time to time. Any significant changes will be duly communicated. If you have any questions regarding data processing at CricketPro, please contact us. Term & Conditions ❘ Privacy Policy ❘ Disclaimer This Website is only for 18+ users. pages.terms: Terms & Conditions. Welcome to CricketPro Fantasy Cricket Game! By using our site, you agree to abide by the following terms and conditions: CricketPro Home / Terms / Disclaimer / Privacy Policy / Terms & Conditions CricketPro Welcome to CricketPro Fantasy Cricket Game! By using our website, you agree to abide by the following terms and conditions: 1. Eligibility: You must be at least 18 years old to use our app. By using CricketPro, you confirm that you meet this age requirement. 2. Account Registration: To use our app, you must create an account. You are responsible for keeping your login information secure and should not share it with anyone else. 3. Gameplay: CricketPro is a fantasy cricket game where users can create their own teams and compete against other players. You are responsible for selecting your team and making strategic decisions during gameplay. 4. Fair Play: Cheating and unfair practices, such as using bots or unauthorized software, are strictly prohibited. Any violation of fair play rules may result in your account being suspended or terminated. 5. In-App Purchases: CricketPro may offer in-app purchases for virtual items or premium features. By making a purchase, you agree to our payment terms and refund policy. 6. User Content: By using CricketPro, you grant us the right to use any content you create, such as team names or logos, for promotional purposes. You are responsible for ensuring that your content does not violate any laws or third-party rights. 7. Privacy Policy: Our app collects and stores personal information in accordance with our Privacy Policy. By using CricketPro, you consent to the collection and use of your data as described in the Privacy Policy. 8. Termination: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account at any time, without prior notice, for violating these terms and conditions or for any other reason we deem appropriate. 9. Limitation of Liability: CricketPro is provided "as is" and we do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free gameplay. We are not liable for any damages or losses resulting from your use of our app. 10. Changes to Terms: We reserve the right to update or modify these terms and conditions at any time.
